description.value:
This rune depicts a specific type of dragon, resizing after application to fit the surface of the item.

Activate f envision (metamagic)

Requirements You're receiving a bonus to AC from your dragon's breath cape or shield

Effect If your next action is to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Cast a Spell]{Cast a Spell} with an area of effect that deals the same type of damage as the depicted dragon's breath weapon, the spell gains the effects of the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Widen Spell]{Widen Spell} feat. The rune can only affect spells of 1st level.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
